content: 2 for 10 row for each color as follows color b color c color d color e color a color b color c color d color e please contact me with any questions or comments at iknit2purl2@gmail com or on ravelry iknit2purl2 color a color b color c color d color e color a color b color c color d color e color a color b color c color d color e then repeat row 1 & 2 for 30 row with color a bind off loosely i used knit 2 together through the back loops pass stich back to left needle repeat to end weave in ends with tapestry needle block if needed 3
